to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.contract

Interface IRemoteCommunication

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RemoteCommunication

    public interface IRemoteCommunication
extends java.io.Closeable
    This interface handles the communication with the other Android device (Host or Client). It converts also
    Author:
    sven

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the connection to the partner and if the message listener Thread is running, it will be stopped, too.
      void sendMessage(Message message)
      Encodes the Message as JSON and sends it to the partner.
      void startMessageListener()
      Start the Thread that wait for messages from the Host/Client.

    • Method Detail

      • startMessageListener

        void startMessageListener()
        Start the Thread that wait for messages from the Host/Client.

      • close

        void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Closes the connection to the partner and if the message listener Thread is running, it will be stopped, too. The IRemoteCommunicationListener.connectionProblem(java.lang.Exception) callback will not executed.
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.io.Closeable
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(Message message)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Encodes the Message as JSON and sends it to the partner.
        Parameters:
        message - Message to Encode
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if sending failed
